amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for fair housing programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for fair housing and equal opportunity funding and to reduce funding for the Internal Revenue Service Information Systems and Telecommunications Support Account.

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Green, Al.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 191 (Roll no. 338).
